io.springlets.format

Class EntityFormatAnnotationFormatterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.context.support.EmbeddedValueResolutionSupport
      • io.springlets.format.EntityFormatAnnotationFormatterFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.EmbeddedValueResolverAware, org.springframework.format.AnnotationFormatterFactory<EntityFormat>

    public class EntityFormatAnnotationFormatterFactory
extends org.springframework.context.support.EmbeddedValueResolutionSupport
implements org.springframework.format.AnnotationFormatterFactory<EntityFormat>
    Formats fields annotated with the EntityFormat annotation using a EntityPrinter or EntityMessagePrinter to generate a String from the given entity, and gets an Entity instance from its id through an EntityParser.
    Author:
    Cèsar Ordiñana at http://www.disid.com[DISID Corporation S.L.]

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EntityFormatAnnotationFormatterFactory(org.springframework.context.MessageSource messageSource, org.springframework.beans.factory.ListableBeanFactory beanFactory, org.springframework.core.convert.ConversionService conversionService)
      Creates a new factory with the given MessageSource to get messages depending on the locale.
      EntityFormatAnnotationFormatterFactory(org.springframework.context.MessageSource messageSource, org.springframework.beans.factory.ListableBeanFactory beanFactory, org.springframework.core.convert.ConversionService conversionService, String defaultExpression)
      Creates a new factory with the given MessageSource to get messages depending on the locale.
